channel.title: In the NPCDrop.cfg
channel.description:
Ok, I understand all of this but the DropType. It goes 0,1,2,3,4,5..
Ex.
[code]]//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- NPCID #(1-5) ITEMID AMOUNT[/code]
I am going to alter the items that my monsters drop, but I don't understand the DropType, so can someone explain please?

item.title: In the NPCDrop.cfg
item.dc:creator: @da_crip da crip
item.description:
@da_crip wrote:

umm i really dont understand it either but i know if u want them to drop all ur items that u put in do drop type numba one.

Read full topic
